message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $75.
Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $85.
